attributes.action: Abolish e-Petitions as they are all too often a nuisence when they are chain emailed without proper thought for the facts.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Abolish e-Petitions as they are all too often a nuisence when they are chain emailed without proper thought for the facts. This Petition is a good example of how easy it is to air extreme views without proper preparation of the full facts involved.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
